meanings.definition: A place where men can get their hair cut and styled.
meanings.sent1: My dad goes to barbershops for his haircuts.
meanings.sent2: I walked past two barbershops on the way to the store.
meanings.sent3: The barbershops in town always have the latest magazines to read.
meanings.sent4: Barbershops are like artist studios for hair.
meanings.sent5: The red and white pole outside the barbershops is so iconic.

meanings.definition: The business establishment where barbers work.
meanings.sent1: Barbershops need to have comfortable chairs for their customers.
meanings.sent2: The barbershop down the street is always busy on weekends.
meanings.sent3: I wonder if barbershops have secret meetings after closing time.
meanings.sent4: The barbershop is the heart of the neighborhood.
meanings.sent5: The barbershop's sign was painted in bright colors to attract attention.

meanings.definition: The act of getting a haircut at a barbershop.
meanings.sent1: I enjoy the experience of barbershops more than salons.
meanings.sent2: Barbershops offer traditional haircuts with a modern twist.
meanings.sent3: Getting a haircut at barbershops always makes me feel refreshed.
meanings.sent4: The ritual of going to barbershops is a comforting routine.
meanings.sent5: The sound of scissors clipping at barbershops is oddly soothing.
